definition: Huang Fugui, ghost of legends who provided Liu Juanzi with his magical recipes 劉涓子鬼遺方|刘涓子鬼遗方
surname Huang or Hwang
yellow/pornographic/to fall through
father
ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations
to beg while playing the xiao 箫 (mouth organ)/cf Wu Zixu 伍子胥, destitute refugee from Chu 楚, busked in Wu town c. 520 BC, then became a powerful politician
following the model/according to precedent
legendary ape of Sichuan and Yunnan, with a penchant for carrying off girls
to berate/to shout loudly
variant of 勞什子|劳什子[lao2 shi2 zi5]
to invite the devil to one's house (idiom)/to introduce a potential source of trouble
carrier pigeon (used for mail)
to carry out gymnastic tricks on horizontal bar
list of emperors and kings/dynastic genealogy
to tell/to inform
to stop eating and spit out
divination/fortune telling
(polite) my maternal uncle
five chief demons of folklore personifying pestilence/cf four horsemen of the apocalypse
to talk provokingly or nonsensically
